profile.description: Add assigned printers - CUPS - Internet Printing Protocol

pclass.name: userinterface.rccustom.custom_cmd_net_final
pclass.pvalue:
cat &lt&lt EOF &gt&gt /bin/igel_create_assigned_printers.sh #!/bin/bash #set -x #trap read debug
ACTION="create_assigned_printers_\${1}"
COUNT=1
# output to systemlog with ID amd tag LOGGER="logger -it \${ACTION}"
echo "Starting" | \$LOGGER
case "\$1" in init) # attach assigned printers to computer cat /tmp/igel_assigned_printers.csv | while read LINE do if &lb \`hostname\` = \`echo \${LINE} | awk --field-separator "," '{print \$1}'\` &rb; then PNAME=\`echo \$LINE} | awk --field-separator "," '{print \$2}'\` PIPP=\`echo \${LINE} | awk --field-separator "," '{print \$3}'\` lpadmin -p \${PNAME} -E -v ipp://\${PIPP} -m everywhere if &lb \`echo \${LINE} | awk --field-separator "," '{print \$4}'\` = default &rb; then lpoptions -d \${PNAME} fi fi done ;; stop) # nothing to do echo "stop" ;; esac
echo "Finished" | \$LOGGER
exit 0 EOF
cat &lt&lt EOF &gt&gt /tmp/igel_assigned_printers.csv ITC0800270F8F74,lab1427_3d_printer,BRWB068E696FC10/ipp/print,default ITC0800270F8F75,lab1428_3d_printer,BRWB068E696FC10/ipp/print,default EOF
chmod 755 /bin/igel_create_assigned_printers.sh /bin/igel_create_assigned_printers.sh init
